com.p4535992.util.xml

Class XMLKit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.p4535992.util.xml.XMLKit

  • public class XMLKit
extends java.lang.Object
    Little Utility for Create,Read,Delete adn Update XML File without Third Library JAVA Created by 4535992 on 28/03/2015.

      • saxonTransform

        public static void saxonTransform(java.lang.String sourcePath,
                  java.lang.String xsltPath,
                  java.lang.String resultPath)
        Simple transformation method using Saxon XSLT 2.0 processor.
        Parameters:
        sourcePath - - Absolute path to source GML file.
        xsltPath - - Absolute path to XSLT file.
        resultPath - - Absolute path to the resulting RDF file.
